choices.text:
Put together a healthy meal plan for me for today.
Sure, here's an example of a balanced and nutritious meal plan for you to follow:
```vbnet
Breakfast: Greek yogurt with mixed berries, whole grain toast, and almond milk
Lunch: Grilled chicken breast salad with mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, cucumbers, and homemade dressing made from olive oil, lemon juice, garlic, salt, and black pepper. Served with a side of steamed asparagus.
Dinner: Baked salmon with quinoa and roasted vegetables (such as broccoli, cauliflower, and carrots) served with brown rice. Enjoy!
Snack: Greek yogurt with mixed berries and honey for added sweetness.
```
Remember to listen to your body's hunger cues and make adjustments to the meal plan accordingly.
